metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8915 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
bsdcpio in libarchive before 3.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (invalid read and crash) via crafted cpio file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8915` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.2
bsdtar - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.2
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-7ubuntu2.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libarchive package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-7ubuntu2.2').
